title: The WAT30B Water Dispenser Demo ►NewAir
description:
In this video we’re going to take a closer look at the WAT30B Pure Spring water dispenser from NewAir. 

The WAT30B is 100% BPA-free to provide pure, crisp clean drinking water. It dispenses hot, cold and room temperature water from 3 separate nozzles. It includes a bottle spike for easy loading and spill prevention. There is a reliable child-safety lock on the hot water button, and the unit even has a convenient insulated storage cabinet. 

The WAT30B is UL and Energy Star Tested and approved. There’s also even a switch to disable the hot and cold water so you can control your energy usage. And the drip tray is removable and dishwasher safe.

The WAT30B also has a stainless steel water tank to provide crisp, clear clean tasting water.

transcripts: Hi I'm Matthew we're going to take a closer look at the WAT30B pure spring water dispenser from NewAir. The WAT30B is 100-percent BPA-free to provide pure crisp clean drinking water. It  dispenses hot, cold and warm water from three separate nozzles. It includes a bottle spot for easy loading and spill prevention. There's a reliable child safe lock on the hot water button and the unit even has a convenient insulated storage compartment. WAT30B is UL and energy star tested and approved, there's even a switch to disable the hot and cold water so you can control your energy usage and the drip tray is removable and dishwasher safe. The WAT30B also has a stainless steel water tank to provide crisp clear clean-tasting. Thanks for checking out the WAT30B pure spring water dispenser from NewAir.
